thread.title: BRIEF-Element Fleet Management Reports Q4 Adjusted EPS Of C$0.18

title: BRIEF-Element Fleet Management Reports Q4 Adjusted EPS Of C$0.18
text: March 15, 2018 / 11:17 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Element Fleet Management Reports Q4 Adjusted EPS Of C$0.18 Reuters Staff March 15 (Reuters) - Element Fleet Management Corp: * ELEMENT FLEET MANAGEMENT REPORTS Q4 AND FISCAL 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE C$0.18 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.20 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY ‍NET REVENUE $229.8 MILLION​ * ‍EXPECTS TO INCUR A RESTRUCTURING CHARGE OF APPROXIMATELY $40 MILLION IN Q1 * ‍ONE-TIME STRATEGIC REVIEW COSTS OF $11.9 MILLION WERE RECOGNIZED IN Q4​ * ELEMENT FLEET MANAGEMENT - ‍ IN Q4 ESTABLISHED A PROVISION FOR IMPAIRMENT OF $29.0 MILLION AGAINST ITS INVESTMENT IN 19(TH) CAPITAL LLC JV Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
